event.title: the continuous expansion of Metro Manila, the municipality is now

data.event: With the continuous expansion of Metro Manila, the municipality is now included in Manila conurbation which reaches Lipa City in its southernmost part.

event.title: October 22, 1845, Spanish Governor General Narciso Claveria promulgated

data.event: On October 22, 1845, Spanish Governor General Narciso Claveria promulgated a Decree for the establishment of a new town comprising Salinas-Leiton and Tierra Alta of San Francisco de Malabon, what is now the town of Gen. Trias.

event.title: October 27, Don Juan Arlegui, Vicar-General of the Archdiocese of Manila informed

data.event: On October 27, Don Juan Arlegui, Vicar-General of the Archdiocese of Manila informed the Politico-Military Governor of Cavite Don Miguel Roca, that he was designated by the Governor-General to look for a person of unquestionable integrity who will be entrusted with the money for the construction of the church building.

event.title: November 3, 1845, presbyter Don Mamerto Ner, who was at that time one of the priests of the Curia of Manila, was appointed

data.event: On November 3, 1845, presbyter Don Mamerto Ner, who was at that time one of the priests of the Curia of Manila, was appointed parish priest and served until December 1866.
On November 3, 1845, presbyter Don Mamerto Ner, who was at that time one of the priests of the Curia of Manila, was appointed parish priest and served until December 1866.
